alert.note: Alert for Madison; St. Francois (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 9:51PM CDT until July 12 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern St. Francois County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Womac to near Fredericktown to near Glover, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fredericktown, Junction City, Cobalt, Marquand, Buckhorn, and Saco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
